      • classify

        public int classify(DiscretizedDataInstance instance)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs classification by delegating it to some child node or directly if this is a leaf node.
        Parameters:
        instance - DiscretizedDataInstance instance that is to be classified.
        Returns:
        Integer that is the predicted class assignment.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
